message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $14,000. I believe this product will be very valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,250.  I think that's a fair compromise considering the value this product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,250 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. Can you consider that?
